# KanaDojo (kanadojo.com)

## Summary
KanaDojo is a free, aesthetic, minimalist Japanese learning web app for practicing Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji (by JLPT levels), and Vocabulary with interactive training modes, progress tracking, and themes.

## Best entry points (humans + LLMs)
- https://kanadojo.com/en
- https://kanadojo.com/en/kana
- https://kanadojo.com/en/kanji
- https://kanadojo.com/en/vocabulary
- https://kanadojo.com/en/jlpt/n5
- https://kanadojo.com/en/translate
- https://kanadojo.com/en/faq
- https://kanadojo.com/en/academy

## Developer / contributor entry points (GitHub)
- https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo
- https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo/blob/main/README.md
- https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo/blob/main/AGENTS.md
- https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md

## Good first issues
- https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22
- https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22help+wanted%22

## Architecture / docs
- https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo/blob/main/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md
- https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo/blob/main/docs/API.md
- https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo/blob/main/docs/TRANSLATION_GUIDE.md
- https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo/blob/main/docs/TROUBLESHOOTING.md

## Locales
This site is localized in:
- English: https://kanadojo.com/en
- Spanish: https://kanadojo.com/es
- Japanese: https://kanadojo.com/ja

## Notes for automated tools
- Prefer `npm run check` for validation.
- Do not rely on `npm run build` for verification.
- Use path aliases (`@/features`, `@/shared`, `@/core`) for imports.

## Avoid / ignore
- Archived docs: https://github.com/lingdojo/kanadojo/tree/main/docs/archived
- Generated build artifacts and Next.js internals (`/_next/*`)
